gOS runs on Ubuntu and Enlightenment as its graphical interface. The OS is available to download on one LiveCD. In store, you can also buy Everex gPC with preinstalled gOS. At the gOS desktop, you will find many programs or web pages such as Google Maps, Google Searchbar, Google Mail, Google Docs, YouTube, Blogger, Wikipedia and more.
